widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: New Video Scripts: We have written scripts for overview videos on some of our major Justia Legal Guides, such as Family Law, Divorce, Criminal Law, DUI, Personal Injury, Car Accidents, Estate Planning, and Employment Law. These will help improve visitors' engagement with these key pages.
Title Tags Project: We are adjusting the title tags for many of our Justia Legal Guides to determine whether integrating more references to “law” and related terms may improve performance.
Additional Snippets: We have improved the accessibility and clarity of our Tax Law center by writing more snippets highlighting critical points in this area.
Supreme Court Redesign: We continue redesigning our Supreme Court center and are closer to completion. We are being assisted by the SEO and Engineering teams, among others.
